title: Chehalis River - Lower (aka Statlu-Chehalis)
whats_it_like: The best intermediate run in the Fraser Valley, down a wilderness canyon
scouting_portaging: The IV- rapids can be scouted and portaged at low water

time.original: 1 hour at high water; 4 hours at low water with scouting

when_to_go: During or after rainfall October-March, snowmelt April-June
